Posts.Content: Jan 25, 2014 07:25PM Jpsara wrote: Beware of taking reconstruction too lightly, I was like you, perfectly healthy ( except for the damn cancer), active eat clean etc. Am on my 5th surgery for reconstruction, it's a f"""""'g disaster!!!  Not sure where I am going from here, but has totally screwed me up emotionally, depressed all the time, crying etc. Wish I never even found out about the |\~\&$@  cancer now....would be happier in the box!!
Posts.Title: This Sucks! sweetjam vbishop
